character.statement: Something under the machine is absorbing the force of the hammer. I need to replace it with something bouncy!
Let's see if you've got anything in those skinny arms!
Ha ha! I guess you need to hit the gym and grow some muscles.
Such strength! We should pump iron together some time. Until then, keep this hammer as a token of my admiration.
Such strength! We should pump iron together some time.
The ferris wheel doesn't stop for anyone.
Just where did you find that lever, a heap of junk? We've got to grease these gears or those kids will be stuck up there all night!
That's the last time I let my boyfriend pick the ride! Now we're going on the Tunnel of Love.
This is usually a two person ride, but be my guest.
Hey, can you give me a hand?
We have a strict "hands-to-yourself" policy that these teens need to obey. We'll teach them a lesson. Go to the Haunted Lab and get yourself a mask. You'll need this.
character.statment: Terrific! Sneak up on them and surprise them with it. I'll stop the ride.

character.statement: Where did all the carnies go?
Where did all the carnies go?
They all ran into the woods! Something weird is going on!
They all ran into the woods! Something weird is going on!
